testcase.name: Verification of Login Function
testcase.system-out: Given the user on the belgenet page.........................................passed When the user clicks the Demo button........................................passed And the user enters the username as "botcu".................................passed And the user enters the password as "spider"................................passed And the user clicks the login button........................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the home page.........................passed

testcase.name: Open Evrak Olustur page
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged in................................................passed When the user clicks on Evrak Islemleri button..............................passed And the user clicks on Evrak Olustur button.................................passed Then the Evrak Olustur window should open...................................passed

testcase.name: Fill the Bilgileri part of Evrak Olustur
testcase.system-out: Given the Evrak Olustur page is open........................................passed When the user clicks Bilgileri button.......................................passed Then the user fills in the input part of Kaldirilacak Klasorler.............passed And the user fills in the input part of Geregi..............................passed And the user fills in the input part of Onay Akisi..........................passed

testcase.name: Fill Editor part of Evrak Olustur
testcase.system-out: Given mandatory sections in the Bilgileri part are filled...................passed When the user clicks Editor button..........................................passed Then the user fills in the fields to be written.............................passed

testcase.name: Fill Ekleri part of Evrak Olustur
testcase.system-out: Given the Editor is filled completely.......................................passed When the user clicks Ekleri button..........................................passed And the user fills in the input part of Ek Metni............................passed And the user adds files to Dosya Ekle.......................................passed And the user clicks Ekle button.............................................passed Then the added file will appear in the attachments section..................passed

testcase.name: Sign the created document
testcase.system-out: Given mandatory fields are filled...........................................passed When the user clicks Imzala button..........................................passed And the user selects s-Imza from signature types............................passed And the user clicks Imzala button in pop-up.................................passed And the user selects Evet option available in the pop-up....................passed Then the document creation is successful....................................passed

testcase.name: View the generated document in Imzaladiklarim list
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in main page..............................................passed When the user clicks Islem Yaptiklarim......................................passed And the user clicks Imzaladiklarim..........................................passed And the user clicks Icerik Goster on the first document.....................passed And the user clicks Ekleri button in the document on Imzaladiklarim.........passed Then the Dosya Adi should be the same as in the generated document..........passed

testcase.name: View the generated document in Teslim Alinmayi Bekleyenler list
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in main page..............................................passed When the user clicks Birim Evraklari........................................passed And the user clicks Teslim Alinmayi Bekleyenler.............................passed And the user selects the departmant of the generated document...............passed And the user clicks Icerik Goster on the first document.....................passed And the user clicks Ekleri button in the document on Teslim Alinmayi Bekleyenler.passed Then the Dosya Adi should be the same as in the generated document..........passed
